Description:
Model
Brand: GAMEMAX
Model: Forge AB


Details
Type: ATX Mid Tower
Color: Black
Case Material: Chassis: SPCC: 0.4mm
Front Panel: ABS
Top Panel: Metal cover
Side Panel:
Left: Tempered Glass
Right: Metal cover
With Power Supply: No
Power Supply Mounted: Bottom
Motherboard Compatibility: EATX(280mm Max.),ATX,M-ATX,ITX
Side Panel Window: Yes
Dust Filters: Bottom / Top


Expansion
Internal 3.5" Drive Bays: 1*3.5HDD+5*2.5SSD  or  2*3.5HDD+3*2.5SSD or 3*3.5HDD+2*2.5SSD
Internal 2.5" Drive Bays: 3
Expansion Slots: 7


Front Panel Ports
Front Ports: 2 x Buttons, 1 x USB 3.0, 1 x USB 2.0, 1 x USB Type-C, 1 x Audio,


Cooling System
Fan Options: Front: 3x120mm ARGB Fan (pre-installed)
Top: 2x120mm  ARGB Fan (pre-installed) 
Rear: 1x120mm ARGB Fan (pre-installed)

PSU Cover: 2x120mm (Fan optional)
Radiator Options: Front: 120mm, 140mm,240mm,280mm.360mm
Rear: 120mm*1


Dimensions & Weight
Max GPU Length: 330 mm
Max CPU Cooler Height: 155 mm
Max PSU Length: Bottom/ATX
Dimensions (H x W x D): (L)340*(W)200*(H)436mm


Additional Info
Features: Computer Case Focus on Cooling- 6 x pre-installed 120mm ARGB Fans- 3 x front, 2x top and 1 x rear help with great ventilation, The front of the Forge AB supports up to a 360mm radiator.
Top And Bottom -45-degree view angle captures attention and draws the eye of the viewer into the case. 3xPCs glass on front, allows for glass-free displays.  Front panel featuring dense mesh formassive airflow and efficient dust prevention. Rounded arcfront bezel design.
Standard childproof switch lock,Power switch childproof design, make it safer. Generous space for high-end graphics cards and large coolers.support EATX motherboard, max width 280mm, ATX,Micro-ATX,ITX.
1x USB3.0, 1 x USB2.0, 1 x Type C 
Dust Filer Top and Bottom
Support 330mm GPU
Support 155mm CPU
Label: Chasis GAMEMAX Forge AB Black
